channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024050059
item.description:
Report X-2024050059

Identified by scraper @ 2024-05-03T15:12:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-25
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO IRREG BELT FOR A LEAKING PACKAGE. GRABBED SPILL CART AND WENT TO RESPOND FROM DMP, PUT IN SPILL TRAY. RESPONDER RETURNED TO DMP TO PROCESS LEAKER.
